comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: They married on September 27, 1913, and are shown here embarking on their honeymoon voyage to Europe. He was a titled Englishman, noted for his athletic prowess; she an American beauty, called the most beautiful girl in America. But after three years he ignored her, they parted, he was drinking heavily, she wrote letters of complaint, they were divorced . . . .

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks Richard, for connecting the two images, and Wystan for adding the date of the marriage.  We'll add the date and bride's maiden name to the record the next time we update it.
